name: Ernest The Chicken
Description: Veronica is very worried. Her fiancee, Ernest, went into the spooky Draynor Manor to ask for directions an hour ago and hasn't returned. She asks you to find him.

substeps: Speak to Veronica, found wandering just outside the entrance to Draynor Manor.
Agree to help her find her fiance, Ernest.
Climb the stairs to the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US].
Climb the next set of stairs to the 2nd floor[UK]3rd floor[US].
Talk to Professor Oddenstein in the western room.
He reveals he accidentally turned Ernest into a chicken and needs three parts to fix his machine: a Pressure gauge, a Rubber tube, and an Oil can.
Go down to the ground floor[UK]1st floor[US] and enter the room with the ladder in the north-west corner.
Climb down the ladder into the basement.
Pick up the Oil can from the floor in the small room.
Return to the ground floor[UK]1st floor[US] of the Manor.
Go into the kitchen (south-eastern room) and take the Spade.
Walk to the west side of the Manor to find a Compost heap.
Use the Spade on the Compost heap to find a small key.
Use the key on the door to the small room under the main staircase (the room contains a skeleton).
Enter the room and pick up the Rubber tube from the floor.
On the ground floor[UK]1st floor[US], go to the small room north of the main entrance (with the witch symbol on the map) and pick up the Poison.
Climb the main staircase to the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US].
Enter the south-eastern room and pick up the Fish food.
Use the Poison on the Fish food to create Poisoned fish food.
Walk to the fountain located south-west of the Manor.
Use the Poisoned fish food on the fountain (the piranhas will die).
Search the fountain to obtain the Pressure gauge.
With the Oil can, Rubber tube, and Pressure gauge in your inventory, return to Professor Oddenstein on the top floor.
Talk to Professor Oddenstein. He will take the parts, fix the machine, and turn Ernest back into a human.
Ernest will thank you and give you your reward.
